attributes.action: Keep happy hours in pubs and clubs, and stop the ban considered to get rid of them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is considering an all out ban on happy hours in pubs and clubs.

The government is expected to publish the results of an independent review into the link between price promotion and alcohol abuse in the next few weeks. It will then begin consultation about new legislation to regulate the industry, which could include banning happy hours.

Alcohol must be sold and marketed responsibly, but this is no need to put a complete ban on happy hours in pubs and clubs.
Put more pressure on individual pub companies to market more responsbily, but don't put a complete ban on happy hours.
